summary: I made a couple light saber hilts.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] introduction [/b]
MurdermiesteR here with some more stupid stuff I use. This time it is light saber hilts. I use light saber mods. I like them. I wanted my own saber, I made one. It is a lot like Vader's, only different.  

[b] description [/b]
This mod adds three light saber hilts to be used in the game. Ben Kenobi, Darth Vader, and MurdermiesteR.
They come as different one handed weapons and don't include the saber blade. That is an enchantment from your favorite saber mod.
Making different one handed weapon types out of the sabers allows you the freedom of different kill animations and perks.
Plus you can favorite a bunch of sabers and wear a belt of them if you use the  bDisableGearedUp=0 edit or any mods that replicate it.
The MurdermiesteR hilt is transparent exposing the inner workings of the saber. That is because I am a freak about this crap.

[b] install [/b]
I suggest NMM or Mod Organizer. Or just drop the .esp and .bsa in your data folder and do the data tick dance.

[credits]
Bethesda for the great game and stuff
Nexus for the awesome community and hosting the party
3DS Max
gimp
NifSkope
MurdermiesteR (me) [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR

files.name: MurdersabeR upgrade
files.changelogHtml:
Improvements to the MurdersabeRs.
Added various effects to the crystals including flowing electricity and pulsing glow effect.
Added blinking lights.
The dagger version now has transparency and internals.

files.name: MurdersabeR and Vader upgrade
files.changelogHtml: Ditched the red solid lights on Vader 1H hilt and added twinkling lights of different colors.
